City News

Solid Waste Services Update:

Frontier Waste will be in Troy tomorrow (Jan. 28th) collecting trash and bulk.

 

Due to hazardous driving conditions, City Hall will be closed tomorrow (Tuesday, Jan. 27th).

City Staff will be available to respond if the need arises.

 

Due to inclement weather, City Hall will be closed tomorrow (Monday, Jan. 26th).

City Staff will be available to respond if the need arises.

 

Roadway Condition Update:

City roads have begun to accumulate ice and are becoming unsafe for travel.
